conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you know why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Mary
conversation.Text: I heard there was some technical issue with the tracks.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Oh, that's not good. How long do you think the delay will be?

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. We are working to fix the issue as quickly as possible.

conversation.Name: Mary
conversation.Text: Thank you for the update. We appreciate your efforts.
